job_description:
• 6+ years of hands-on experience in designing, building, scaling, and maintaining production servicesProficient in modern software architectural principles and patterns (Domain-driven design, REST, GraphQL etc)Experience delivering distributed systems and high-scale microservices on AWSExperience with serverless architecture (AWS components like Lambda , API Gateway, DynamoDB , AppSync, OpenSearch, ElastiCache etc)Experience developing front-end and back-end software, preferably including JavaScript or TypeScript and runtimes, including Node.
• Experience working with authentication and authorization protocols/frameworks (OpenID Connect, OAuth, SAML etc.
• )Experience in working with AI models and integration with LLM gatewaysExperience in test-driven development and testing frameworks (Jest, Playwright, and other related test frameworks a plus).

job_title: Technical Support Professional - Mission-Critical Emergency Systems
job_description:
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
